## Public Member Functions

### applyFixup() {#a07f68977860b1721db6a7271f2861555}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LoongArchAsmBackend::applyFixup (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &amp; Fixup, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue">MCValue</a> &amp; Target, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef</a>&lt; char &gt; Data, uint64&#95;t Value, bool IsResolved, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42; STI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Apply the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a></code> for given <code>Fixup</code> into the provided data fragment, at the offset specified by the fixup and following the fixup kind as appropriate.

Errors (such as an out of range fixup value) should be reported via <code>Ctx</code>. The <code>STI</code> is present only for fragments of type <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcrelaxablefragment">MCRelaxableFragment</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdatafragment">MCDataFragment</a> with hasInstructions() == true.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/lib/target/loongarch/mctargetdesc/loongarchasmbackend-h/#l00046">46</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/lib/target/loongarch/mctargetdesc/loongarchasmbackend-h">LoongArchAsmBackend.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/lib/target/loongarch/mctargetdesc/loongarchasmbackend-cpp/#l00145">145</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/lib/target/loongarch/mctargetdesc/loongarchasmbackend-cpp">LoongArchAsmBackend.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### shouldInsertExtraNopBytesForCodeAlign() {#aa05af02ae909fc030207294fa161cd08}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoongArchAsmBackend::shouldInsertExtraNopBytesForCodeAlign (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment">MCAlignFragment</a> &amp; AF, unsigned &amp; Size)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Hook to check if extra nop bytes must be inserted for alignment directive.

For some targets this may be necessary in order to support linker relaxation. The number of bytes to insert are returned in Size.

### writeNopData() {#aacb87d7c3bf496454f2d5015c35fc92b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoongArchAsmBackend::writeNopData (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, uint64&#95;t Count, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42; STI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Write an (optimal) nop sequence of Count bytes to the given output.

If the target cannot generate such a sequence, it should return an error.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
- True on success.
</SectionUser>
